mapper.select: SELECT NUM, ADCODE, ADNICK, ADDATE, ADUNDATE FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY AD_DATE DESC ) AS NUM,A.AD_CODE AS ADCODE, AD_NICK AS ADNICK, TO_CHAR(AD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ADDATE , (TO_CHAR(AD_STATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS ADUNDATE FROM ADMIN A LEFT JOIN ADMIN_STATE S ON A.AD_CODE = S.AD_CODE ORDER BY AD_DATE DESC ) WHERE NUM BETWEEN 1+((#{vNum}-1)*10) AND (#{vNum}*10)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADMIN(AD_CODE, AD_PW, AD_NICK, AD_DATE) VALUES(('ADMIN'||LPAD(TO_CHAR(ADMIN_SEQ.NEXTVAL), 3, '0')), #{adPw} , '관리자'||TO_CHAR(ADMIN_SEQ.NEXTVAL), SYSDATE)
